NAME: Dan
AUTHOR: Alzarath
DESCRIPTION:
Search https://danbooru.donmai.us/ for anime pictures.

Usage: [p]dan [tags...]: Fetch the latest image
[p]danr [tags...]: Fetch a random image
[p]danfilter list: Lists all filters applied to the server
[p]danfilter add [filter name]: Add a filter to the server
[p]danfilter del [filter name]: Delete a filter from the server

Disclaimer: By default this cog does not display NSFW content, but it is able to through setting filters.
